text: aur jab un logon ke saamane hamaaree raushan aayate padheen jaatee hain to jin logon ko (marane ke baad) hamaaree hujooree ka khataka nahin hai vah kahate hai ki hamaare saamane isake alaava koee doosara (kuraan lao ya usaka raddo badal kar daalo (ai rasool tum kah do ki mujhe ye ekhteyaar nahin ki mai use apane jee se badal daaloon mai to bas usee ka paaband hoon jo meree taraph vahee kee gaee hai mai to agar apane paravaradigaar kee naapharamaanee karu to bade (kathin) din ke azaab se darata hoon
